Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at Ewing/92nd
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via: Ewing, 92nd, Mackinaw, Harbor, 95th, due to, street blockage, near Ewing/92nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Ewing, 92nd, Mackinaw, Harbor, 95th, due to, street blockage, near Ewing/92nd.

Allow extra travel time.
